comment._content: All the signs in the photo are only for counties of New York State.

comment.author: 28595994@N04
comment._content: Convention Hall.  It's a shame it burned down.  It had quite a history.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In September, 1912, both the Democratic and Republican parties of the State of New York held their state conventions in the upstate resort town of Saratoga Springs -- the Democratic convention was held first.
